title: Tesla Cybertruck lands on Mars and picks up the Curiosity rover on its 6' bed
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars.

title: Tesla FSD finally makes driving obsolete. After years of delay, Tesla Full Self Driving can drive you to work while you work, play, or sleep
tuit: Autopilot is an advanced driver assistance system that assists your car with steering, accelerating and braking for other vehicles and pedestrians within its lane. It assists with the most burdensome parts of driving and work alongside features like emergency braking, collision warning and blind-spot monitoring. With Full Self-Driving (FSD) capability, you will get access to a suite of more advanced driver assistance features, designed to provide more active guidance and assisted driving under your active supervision.

title: 100s of SpaceX Starships land on Mars after a 6 month journey. 1000s of Martian colonists being building Mars Base 1
tuit: Tesla Cybertruck lands on Mars and picks up the Curiosity Rover on its 6'' bed. The Tesla Cybertruck is an all-electric pickup truck with a unique, futuristic design that features a stainless steel exoskeleton and armored glass windows. It has impressive performance capabilities, with the ability to accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in as little as 2.9 seconds and tow up to 14,000 pounds.
